name: Wombat Buddy
description:
Recommended to be played in a mobile browser!

Early proof of concept experimenting with AI. Earn the wombat's trust (with food) and collect all the gold on the island (10 pieces).

Collect the apples, then press the "A" button (or Space on your keyboard) to place a picked-up apple.

The wombat likes apples and will like you if you give him one.

If the wombat likes you, he'll follow you and dig up treasure for you.

Any feedback is much appreciated!
